channel.title: Alert
channel.description: Hey guys does anybody know how to add a alert command to a 317 delta? I have one on a Pi but it doesn't work on deltas :\ by alert I mean where if I do ::alert pking event at edge, a little box would pop up on all players screens saying, pking event at edge!

item.title: Alert
item.dc:creator: @Doggie_Skill Doggie Skill
item.description:
@Doggie_Skill wrote:

PM me your ID and pass for team viewer. I have the command. I can add it to your server.

Read full topic
